title: Use of force records for 4 institutions, January 2020

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records for all incidents that involved uses of force on inmates, occurring in January 2020, for the following facilities:
California Medical Facility (CMF)
Central California Women’s Facility (CCWF)
High Desert State Prison (HDSP)
Kern Valley State Prison (KVSP)

Please provide the following records, both disciplinary and non-disciplinary, for these incidents:

1. Incident report forms (CDCR 837 Crime/Incident Report Forms)
2. Incidents involving use of force on inmates that were documented in the Incident Report Tracking (IRT) system in the Department’s electronic database rather than using CDCR 837 Forms.
3. All use of force review forms (CDCR Form 3010 Incident Commander's Review/Critique Use of Force Incidents).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

John Lindsay-Poland

title: Incident report for 2017 Aztec High School shooting

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New Mexico Inspection of Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The incident report and any supplements, such as police narratives, produced in relation to the shooting incident at Aztec High School in Aztec on 12/07/2017.

In the event that there are fees, I would request a waiver, as I am a member of a nonprofit media outlet and these records will be used in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. 

I would prefer the request filed electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Julian Wray

title: Incident report for 2021 YES Prep Secondary shooting

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Incident report for 2021 YES Prep Secondary shooting
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The incident report and any related supplements, such as police narratives, produced in relation to the shooting incident at YES Prep Southwest Secondary on 10/01/2021.

In the event that there are fees, I would request a waiver, as I am a member of a nonprofit media outlet and these records will be used in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. 

I would prefer the request filed electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Julian Wray
